items.title: Our Two-Party System Isn’t Going Anywhere
items.description: Elon Musk’s America Party is the latest third-party dream to die.

items.title: Ban the Fear, Not the Freedom: Massachusetts Bill Misses the Mark on Nicotine
items.description: In a society of free, autonomous adults, banning nicotine because it offends one legislator’s sensibilities is simply unacceptable.

items.title: Government by Emergency Is a Bad Idea
items.description: The presidency doesn’t need any more discretionary power.

items.title: RFK Jr. Is Compounding the CDC’s Covid Mistakes
items.description: The HHS secretary is substituting one set of unscientific, politically driven priorities for another.

items.title: Sorry, Democrats: Rural Hospitals Aren’t at Risk from Trump’s Reforms
items.description: Far from endangering rural hospitals, President Trump and Republicans in Congress are helping them by fixing a broken Medicaid system.
